meanings.sent1: I saw a bug crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The bug flew around the garden.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bug cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The bug scurried through the grass like a tiny explorer.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bug caught my eye with its delicate wings.

meanings.definition: An error or flaw in a computer program
meanings.sent1: The software engineer fixed a bug in the code.
meanings.sent2: The bug caused the program to crash unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer catch a cold? It had a bug!
meanings.sent4: The bug in the system disrupted the entire operation.
meanings.sent5: Finding and fixing a bug in the code can be challenging.

meanings.sent1: Please don't bug me while I'm studying.
meanings.sent2: Stop trying to bug your little sister.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fly bug the spider? It wanted to have a chat!
meanings.sent4: The constant buzzing sound started to bug me after a while.
meanings.sent5: Her persistent questions began to bug him during the meeting.
